caption.p: The phylogenetic tree of 38 coronaviruses with nucleotide sequences of RNA-dependent RNA polymerase, constructed by the neighbor-joining method using MEGA 7. The four coronavirus genera are grouped in shades of yellow ( Alphacoronavirus), lightblue ( Betacoronavirus), pink ( Gammacoronavirus), and cyan ( Deltacoronavirus). Seven human coronaviruses are marked in red.
